definition: The only word on this site that has nothing to do with sex or drugs!
author: pirates rule!!!

definition: It's a form of salutation of greeting in the English language, aslo used at telephone.
author: RetardWolf
example: Hello, can I help you with something?

definition: Acronym for Model View Controller, a software architecture pattern/[framework]/paradigm related to graphical user interfaces.
author: CanonCat
example: It can be argued that a text [editor] uses MVC; the [controller] parses keyboard and mouse [input] and updates the data in the document and the view of the editor and the document.

definition: The widely used acronym for 'Marvel vs. Capcom' which is a 2d arcade fighting game. Numerics can also be added to [designate] the series of Marvel vs. [Capcom] games such as MVC1 and [MVC2].
author: Jin Saotome
example: "Yo, wanna hit the mall and play a little MVC? I'll [school you] [wit'] my [Mags], Cable, Storm team fo sho."

definition: The most valuable cunt. Used to describe the [hotest] slut [available] on a [night out].
author: TheTurkish
example: [Hollie] is such a mvc man, [I bet] she has [no pants] on either.

definition:
MVC is a [ESports] team that is made up of young players

They also are [Gods] at any games they play and are really [nice people]
author: MVC Clan
